meanings.definition: A type of Indian sweet made from condensed milk and sugar.
meanings.sent1: I love the taste of burfi, especially the ones with nuts in them.
meanings.sent2: During Diwali, my mom always makes delicious burfi for us to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The burfi was so sweet, it made my teeth ache a little!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a piece of burfi on a festive day.
meanings.sent5: The colorful burfi looked like little blocks of happiness on the plate.

meanings.sent1: Let's burfi together this weekend and enjoy the homemade treat.
meanings.sent2: She burfied the whole batch of sweets in just one sitting!
meanings.sent3: I burfied so much yesterday that I had dreams about sugary delights.
meanings.sent4: His laughter burfied the room with joy and warmth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly burfied burfi filled the kitchen with sweetness.
